Posts.EditableText: Hello, it's me again :-) There are too many line breaks for my taste in the gamebook display. Between the page text and links, and also between the links themselves. Is there a way to kill the auto entered line breaks?

Posts.EditableText: Oh, I can just add the page links myself without using the interface. Duh. False alarm! Haha.
